ProductInfo.Features:
9.7 inch IPS screen, 1024*768 pixels, exceptional quality, regardless of viewing angle, response speed, static and dynamic clarity or color reproduction, achieving the highest level in the LCD panel at present.
1.5GHz RK3066 cortex A9 dual core CPU + quad core GPU Ultra thin and light
Newest Android ice cream sandwich OS (Android 4.0.4) Dual camera, 2MP front camera + 2MP rear camera
1GB RAM DDR3 + 16GB flash memory (system space 2GB arround).Bluetooth, wifi, Flash player 11.1/HDMI out supported Google play store supported, Access tons of games, magazine, music, social entertainment apps!
Metal In Ear style earphone included
